title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 16th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd and Fox News Contributor Liz Peek discuss the New York Times' questionable story about Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh.

Todd speaks with Fox News Contributor and Author Mollie Hemingway about the continued attacks from the left and Democrats on Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh.
